title: Salah Wear - الصلاة على النبي
summary: Reminder to bless (salah) on the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ on your Phone /Android Watch
developerAddress:
American University of Sharjah
POBox 26666 Key 128
description: Salah Wear is an app that reminds you to bless (salah) on the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ on your Android Wear Watch Or Your PhoneThe app supports both Round, Squared Android Wear Devices and Android PhonesYou can select the time interval and enable vibration option This app will not work on phones, it works on Android Wear watches (Moto 360, Huawei Watch ,LG G Watch ...)
descriptionHTML:
Salah Wear is an app that reminds you to bless (salah) on the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ on your Android Wear Watch Or Your Phone

The app supports both Round, Squared Android Wear Devices and Android Phones

You can select the time interval and enable vibration option

This app will not work on phones, it works on Android Wear watches (Moto 360, Huawei Watch ,LG G Watch ...)
comments: جزاك الله خير اللهم صل وسلم وبارك على النبي محمد
